channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Browser Screenshots
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Browser Screenshots

item.title: CVE-2021-24439|2024-08-03T19:28:23.951Z -- unknown -- browser%20screenshots
item.description: The Browser Screenshots WordPress plugin before 1.7.6 allowed authenticated users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks as the image_class parameter of the browser-shot shortcode was not escaped.
